pkgmetadata.longdescription: Comparative Methods for Phylogenetic Networks // Analyze the phenotypic evolution of species of hybrid origin on a phylogenetic network. This can detect a burst of variation at the formation of a hybrid as well as an increase or decrease in trait value at a hybridization event. Parameters are estimated by maximum likelihood, and model averaging can be done automatically. Users need to enter a comparative data set and a phylogenetic network.
